 Ravy's trying to take over your company.

en: Han nämnde nån shono, nån chef… Tomas eller nåt.
pa: He was mentioning a guy you work for. Like, Tomas I think he said.

pa:
I'm helping him with the last delivery on Tuesday.
 Then I just want to be with you.

vi: Chắc hết hai phút rồi.
